cluster.name: Subtype A
cluster.description: Original subtype found in the DRC; Also identified in East and West Africa; old reference strain date from 1985; child clusters A1 and A2

cluster.name: Subtype A (A1)
cluster.description: Descendant from subtype A; Identified in East Africa (Kenya); First Reference strain dates back to 1992.

cluster.name: Subtype A (A2)
cluster.description: Descendant from subtype A; Identified in Central Africa and Europe (Cyprus); only few isolates identified; old reference strain dates back to 1994

cluster.name: Subtype B
cluster.description: Related to subtype D found in Africa; Identified in the United States of America; Causes worldwide Homosexual epidemic; first reference strain dates back to 1983

cluster.name: Subtype C
cluster.description: Original subtype found in Central Africa (DRC); Idenitified in Southern and East Africa; Causes explosive heterosexual epidemic in Africa, Asia and South America; First reference strain dates back to 1986; Child clusters C India and C South America.

cluster.name: Subtype D
cluster.description: Original subtype found in the Central Africa (DRC); Identified in East, West and Southern Africa; Causes epidemic in East and West Africa; First reference strain identified in 1999; Child clusters D Uganda, D South Africa and D Cameroon.

cluster.name: Subtype F (F1)
cluster.description: Descendent from subtype F; Identified in Central Africa, South America and Europe. First reference strain dates back to 1993.

cluster.name: Subtype F (F2)
cluster.description: Descendant from subtype F; Identified in West Africa (Cameroon); Only few isolates identified; First reference strain dates back to 1995.

cluster.name: Subtype G
cluster.description: Original subtype found in the Central Africa (DRC); Identified in West, Central Africa and Europe; First reference strain dates back to 1992; Child clusters G Nigeria and G Spain.

cluster.name: Subtype H
cluster.description: Original subtype found in the Central Africa (DRC); Identified in Central Africa; Only few isolates identified; First reference strain dates back to 1990.

cluster.name: Subtype J
cluster.description: Original subtype found in the Central Africa (DRC); Identified in Central Africa; Only few isolates identified; First reference strain dates back to 1993.

cluster.name: Subtype K
cluster.description: Original subtype found in the Central Africa (DRC); Identified in Central and West Africa; Only few isolates identified; First reference strain dates back to 1996.

cluster.name: CRF 01_AE
cluster.description: Descendant from subtypes A and E; Idenitified in South Asia; Causes heterosexual epidemic in Asia and Europe; First reference strain dates back to 1990.

cluster.name: CRF 02_AG
cluster.description: Descendant from subtypes A and G; Identified in West Africa; First reference strain dates back to 1991.

cluster.name: CRF 03_AB
cluster.description: Descendant from subtypes A and B; Identified in Russia; Causes injection drug use epidemic in Russia; First reference strain dates back to 1997.

cluster.name: CRF 04_CPX
cluster.description: Identified in Europe (Greece and Cyprus); First reference strain dates back to 1991.

cluster.name: CRF 05_DF
cluster.description: Descendant from subtypes D and F; Identified in Central Africa; First reference strain dates back to 1993.

cluster.name: CRF 06_CPX
cluster.description: Identified in West Africa; Causes epidemic in West Africa and Europe (UK); First reference strain dates back to 1995.

cluster.name: CRF 07_BC
cluster.description: Descendet from cluster C from India; Identified in China; First refence strain dates back to 1997.

cluster.name: CRF 08_BC
cluster.description: Descendant from cluster C from India; Identified in China; First reference strain dates back to 1997.

cluster.name: CRF 10_CD
cluster.description: Descendant from subtypes C and D; identified in East Africa; First reference strain dates back to 1996.

cluster.name: CRF 11_CPX
cluster.description: Identified in Europe (Greece); First reference strain dates back to 1999.

cluster.name: CRF 12_BF
cluster.description: Descendant from subtypes B and F; Identified in South America; First reference strain dates back to 1997.

cluster.name: CRF 13_CPX
cluster.description: Identified in West Africa; First reference strain dates back to 1996.

cluster.name: CRF 14_BG
cluster.description: Descendant from subtypes B and G; Identified in Europe (Spain); First reference strains dates back to 1999.

cluster.name: CRF 09_cpx
cluster.description: Identified in West Africa; First reference strain dates back to 1996.

cluster.name: CRF 18_cpx
cluster.description: Identified in Central America (Cuba); First reference strain dates back to 1997.

cluster.name: CRF 19_cpx
cluster.description: Descendant from M group; Identified in Central America (Cuba); First reference strain dates back to 1999.

cluster.name: Subtype A
cluster.description: Descendant from subtype A; Identified in West Africa (Senegal).

cluster.name: Subtype A (A1)
cluster.description: Descendant from subtype A; Identified in East Africa (Kenya); First Reference strain dates back to 1992.

cluster.name: Subtype A (A1)
cluster.description: Descendant from subtype A; Identified in Uzbekistan; First reference strain dates back to 2001.

cluster.name: URF AHJU
cluster.description: Identified in West Africa (Cameroon); First reference strain dates back to 2001.

cluster.name: Subtype C
cluster.description: Descendant from subtype C; Identified in South America (Brazil, Argentina and Uruguay); First reference strain dates back to 1992.

cluster.name: Subtype C
cluster.description: Descendant from subtype C; Identified in South East Asia (India); First reference strain dates back to 1993.

cluster.name: Subtype D
cluster.description: Descendant from subtype D; Identified in West Africa (Cameroon); First reference strain dates back to 2001.

cluster.name: Subtype D
cluster.description: Descendant from subtype D; Identified in East Africa (Uganda); First reference strain dates back to 1992.

cluster.name: Subtype D
cluster.description: Descendant from subtype D; Identified in Southern Africa (South Africa); Extinct strain; First reference strain dates back to 1985.

cluster.name: Subtype G
cluster.description: Descendant from subtype G; Identified in Europe (Spain); Causes epidemic in Europe (Spain, Portugal and UK); First reference strain dates back to 1999.

cluster.name: Subtype G
cluster.description: Descendant from subtype G; Identified in West Africa (Nigeria); First reference strain dates back to 2001.

cluster.name: URF GKU
cluster.description: Identified in West Africa (Senegal).
